lender.name: Lyndsay
lender.loan_because: A friend was kind enough to lend on my behalf.

lender.name: Martin
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of responsibility when you lend money, rather than just give it away - it smells less of a hand-down.

lender.name: In memoria di Angela
lender.loan_because: Questo profilo è stato creato dalle ragazze del team GGD Bologna in memoria di Angela, una mamma che è volata in cielo il 23 aprile del 2010. Insegnante e fotografa, con il suo entusiasmo, la sua creatività e il suo amore per il prossimo, Angela avrebbe sicuramente apprezzato e sostenuto le iniziative di Kiva.
lender.occupational_info: Le Girl Geek Dinners Bologna sono un gruppo di ragazze appassionate di internet e nuovi media. Il gruppo promuove la cultura e l'innovazione digitale femminile nel territorio.

lender.name: Andrew S
lender.loan_because: It's better than giving to groups who will use it to build multi-million-dollar synagogues / churches / temples / mosques / shrines.
lender.occupational_info: A peace-loving explorer and spreader of good will who distributes candy to small children. Also I go to school.

lender.name: Justin
lender.loan_because: I think this is really cool.
lender.occupational_info: I make homes more energy efficient.

lender.name: Douglas
lender.occupational_info: Started in January, 2004 - PHOSITA is an intellectual property law blog that is sometimes funny, usually irreverent and always informative. We greatly appreciate our readers and look forward to engaging with you.

lender.name: james
lender.loan_because: i can

lender.name: SkinFX
lender.loan_because: We at SkinFX believe that so much more can be achieved with a hand up, rather than simply a hand out. With Kiva, it is possible to touch so many more lives that would be normally attainable. Plus we would love to inspire all our clients to follow our lead!
lender.occupational_info: All beauty services provided, along with specialist dermal services including facial peels and piercings.

lender.name: jimmytibble
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Forrest
lender.loan_because: if I don't, who will?
lender.occupational_info: I learn. And learn, and learn, and then want to learn some more.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I have been fortunate and want to help people helping themselves
lender.occupational_info: I own and manage nursing hospitals. I am a widow and have three grown children, one of whom works with me in the family business as a lawyer and manager.

lender.name: Lindsay
lender.whereabouts: Sydney / Vancouver New South Wales / B.C.

lender.name: Integrati Marketing
lender.loan_because: We want people to be empowered to bring themselves out of tough situations with a little financial help and their hard work so they benefit for life.
lender.occupational_info: We are a direct marketing agency, we love what we do, we love great ideas, and of course we love the idea of Kiva!

lender.name: Monica

lender.name: Mary

lender.name: Perry
lender.occupational_info: ~ Get Plastered with Pez......

lender.name: Rick
lender.loan_because: Compared to people in third world countries I am very rich, I have a roof over my head and three meals a day

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I have no reason not to.

lender.name: Clare
lender.loan_because: the small amount of money I can lend is equivalent to a couple of cups of coffee a week, but to someone who needs it, it is everthing

lender.name: Anthony
lender.loan_because: I like it.

lender.name: Heather

lender.name: lorea
lender.loan_because: i care and wish to support those who wouldn't usually be able to access funds to help them succeed. i help because i can. i know what it's like to have great ideas but finding money seems tricky.

lender.occupational_info: Planning zoning (I protect the territory, environment and landscape)

lender.occupational_info: I work in a business of 30 staff assisting small businesses in preparing reports that show them how their business is performing and analysing their sales and costs plus submitting their figures to the tax office and government.

lender.occupational_info: As a teacher I try to be a good model for young people. I try to help where I can and to support where a helping hand is needed while showing as much optimism as possible

lender.name: Sydney

lender.name: S Sawaged
lender.loan_because: Each of us has the right and the obligation to reach our highest potential. Some of us just need a little help in getting there. Kiva is the right thing to do. I feel wonderful doing this and am very happy my friend introduced me to kiva.org

lender.name: Nancy&Bob
lender.loan_because: Congratulations Susan and Ian! This is your wedding gift, a gift of love to the world that will grow alongside your marriage!

lender.name: Derek
lender.loan_because: iSelect provides a unique & innovate approach for consumers searching for insurance solutions. iSelect engages consumers at the needs level first & assesses suitable product level insurance solutions from a range of providers and brands. Call 131920.

lender.name: Jody
lender.loan_because: Everyone should have the opportunity to support themselves and improve their circumstances.
lender.occupational_info: My job description is long and varied - I do everything from recruitment to unblocking toilets!! No two days are ever the same but I love the variety it offers. I am very lucky : )

lender.occupational_info: I care for mentally challenged adults and I go to peoples homes caring for thier feet

lender.name: Barry
lender.loan_because: I discovered Kiva by watching a programme on CNBC called The Barefoot Investor where the co-founder of Kiva, Matt Flannery was being interviewed. I was impressed with the aims and objects of the non-profit organisation so I went to their website and joined up straight away.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a locally owned supermarket which is part of a New Zealand based co-operative. I am a member of the nightfill team working from 11.00 pm until 7.00 am (Tuesday to Saturday) filling the shelves with grocery items for the customers to buy when the store opens at 6.00 am. The hours of work are unsociable but I enjoy the job and have no trouble sleeping during the day except when it is really hot and humid in the summer.

lender.name: Cassandra
lender.loan_because: Because it helps people and that makes me feel good. It's a win win situation.

lender.name: Bryan
lender.loan_because: wading in is easy and safe.

lender.loan_because: I like to help.

lender.name: Lissette
lender.occupational_info: a giving hand.

lender.name: Krystal
lender.loan_because: There are so many reasons as to why I loan through this organization, in fact too many to fit into this small box. Influences range from my background, family, heart, earth, God to empowering women etc.
lender.occupational_info: Artistic, sky, strong, beats, dirt, make-up, rain, Africa, history, people, stars, animals.

lender.name: Aaron
lender.loan_because: it makes a difference!
lender.occupational_info: I am studying International Relations with concentration on Africa and Development

lender.loan_because: I believe everyone deserves a chance at their dreams!
lender.occupational_info: I work in a customer service call center where I take telephone calls from customers. I also provide training to the other customer service representatives.

lender.name: Cline
lender.loan_because: loaning triggers one to work for ones living / giving triggers laying back; hospitalizing. The good thing is: what one gets payed back can be loaned again and so the money goes around the world

lender.name: Klaus
lender.occupational_info: I develop and write for tv-shows

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I cant be there to help in person and hope that the little investment I give helps to change the direction of someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I train people on how to improve their service and offer new ideas on how to grow their business.

lender.name: Tracy Lydiatt
lender.loan_because: I have an abundant life and believe my financial capital can be used for more than buying "stuff". I want to help remove economic barriers so people can work to meet their basic human needs with dignity.
lender.occupational_info: I help businesses and families have an awareness of how their actions affect people and the planet. I work with them to take steps to reduce their impacts, be creative and create community

lender.loan_because: it can be more empowering than just giving.

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: It is a great way to help an entrepreneur that needs to expand their business.
lender.occupational_info: I am in the fresh produce processing business. We provide fresh-cut produce items to restaurant chains, retail grocery chains and food manufacturers.

lender.name: Thomas Boehler
lender.loan_because: I intrinsically believe that poverty can be reduced by better linking individuals in need with those willing to help. This applies across the aisle, including for people in dire need in traditional donor countries as well as providers in countries of the South. Kiva is a step into the right direction to rectify global imbalances in development cooperation.
lender.occupational_info: I am an economist and associate expert at the United Nations in New York, working on a forum for global policy dialogue promoting effectiveness and coherence of development cooperation.

lender.name: Leo
lender.loan_because:
Live was good to me.
I want to see some money working directly in some usefull projects.
lender.occupational_info: I work with a company for occupational health service opreatin al across Germany. The job is mainly to consult companies to maintain and improve the safety at the workplace.

lender.name: Niko
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone deserves a chance and a lend in hand. We live on this world together, and we need to sustain this world together, be it nature or humanity. I've also spent some of my childhood in indonesia, and have seen some levels of poverty eye to eye. no one deserves a life of struggle.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student in design and I do photography.

lender.name: josefin
lender.loan_because: I can make a change.

lender.name: Mandy
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: this small bit of money, that I could easily throw away at the movies or dinner, could mean a world of difference to someone else. If we aren't here to improve the world, what are we here for?
lender.occupational_info: I teach Chemistry to students who are 15-18 years old.

lender.name: Shawn Lattimore
lender.loan_because: I surf all the time in Central America and I would like to give a bit back beyond my tourist dollars.
lender.occupational_info: I teach second graders art and how to sit with good posture :-)

lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Alyssa
lender.loan_because: i want to help other people

lender.occupational_info: my business buys and sells real estate all over the world. we also invest in private loans to other beginning entrepreneurs as i once was.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: I feel indebted to aid others like myself. God has given me so now I give back. I want to bring hope to those who believe that they can improve their lives by succeeding in small businesses. Maybe then, they can inspire others to dream also.
lender.occupational_info: I once worked as a truck driver and as a bellman in a hotel handeling people's luggage. However, my interest in business taught me how to invest wisely. So now I can help others.

lender.name: Gary
lender.loan_because: it promotes self-esteem in the borrower to repay and allows the same money to help many people over and over again.
lender.occupational_info: I create and maintain the software for systems at the San Francisco AIDS Foundation so it can provide the most help to the most people possible.

lender.name: LeeAnn and Kyla
lender.loan_because: I want to empower and encourage others that are trying to make a living for themselves and their families. This page belongs to both my daughter Kyla and I, as she contributes part of her weekly allowance to lend.
lender.occupational_info: I help my company implement new software or enhancements to existing software applications by understanding the need and working with other co-workers to implement them.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I love that the money keeps getting recycled, so the same $25.00 can continue to help many people. As an entrepreneur, it's also important to me to give back and help other entrepreneurs.
lender.occupational_info: I write books. I believe everyone has a story to tell, and I help others tell their story.

lender.occupational_info:
I work in a hospital. I create X-ray images of people as needed for their medical care. I am married. I have children.
I recently learned that a few of my favorite consumer pleasures, coffee, chocolate and sugar, are often produced by the world's poorest workers under conditions of near slavery. Now I buy such products only if the package displays a "Fair Trade" certification. Yes ! It costs more......but I sleep better.

lender.loan_because: I want to share my financial blessings.

lender.occupational_info: I'm a marketing director for a software company.

lender.name: Deb
lender.loan_because: I admire people who strive to better their family's and community's lives through self-empowerment and self-sufficiency. I'm grateful to be in a position to be able to join the Kiva community to offer hope, further opportunity and promote entrepreneurship.
lender.occupational_info: As a self-employed subcontractor, technology enables me to work based from home. I love that the internet enables people from all corners of the world to connect, interact and, in Kiva's case, help one another.

lender.name: Mary Fatima
lender.loan_because: To be of service to those who needs it the most.
lender.occupational_info: Servant for social development.

lender.name: *~Toni~*
lender.loan_because: "Nobody made a greater mistake than he who did nothing because he could only do a little." ~Edmund Burke
lender.occupational_info: I work full time and go to school full time to finish my Bachelor's in Healthcare Management. I'm mom to 3 beautiful little girls. :)

lender.name: Chris L.
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the world and set an example for my children.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I can :-)

lender.name: Noah
lender.loan_because: I believe microfinance is the most constructive way for empowered people to empower others without harming their freedom and creativity.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference

lender.name: Devon
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: PCCP
lender.loan_because: We want to teach our children the importance of being good global citizens.
